name: Serpens Infernum
description:
Welcome to Serpens Infernum deadly laser temple.

can you defeat every soldier in the temple with the deathly laser.
Aim for the right color for the right soldier or else it doesn't works.
solve up to 5 puzzels.

Are you ready to beat them all.

This game is made for the Jim Jam 2.

Enjoy

DragonGino
